title: Authorizes N.Y. police commissioner to promulgate rules and regulations directing uniforms of auxiliary police officer differ from those of the regular police force
summary: Authorizes the police commissioner of the city of New York to promulgate rules and regulations directing that the uniforms of auxiliary police officers be designed in a manner to make them distinct and distinguishable from those worn by members of the regular police force.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to uniforms to be worn by members of the auxiliary police
